comments:
I was going to pull up numerous methods/fields in a class and I got this error 
message.

1. Pulled up numerous fields methods
2. The preview showed me that I needed to pull up various fields as well(i.e. 
error message).
3. I pressed back and added a couple of fields
4. When I went back to preview, I got this exception
